entries.journal_entry_description: Trilom gas emissions are a constant source of danger for miners on Mustafar. This deadly gas causes paranoia, dementia, and eventually, agonizing death. Armstrong discovered that one of his mining crews hit a pocket of this gas. There is no cure for Trilom poisoning, and the affected miners need to be destroyed before they can cause harm to others.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: All Mustafarian miners are equipped with a homing device to help find them in case of an emergency. These devices send a signal back to a computer that is located in the base camp. Armstrong has given you directions to the main camp. From there you can use the computer to find the miners.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Travel to the Poisoned Miners' Camp
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The computer is located inside the base camp of the missing miners. Use the computer to track down where they have went.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Now that the computer is active, wait for it to return the location of the miners.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The tracking computer directed you where to find the miners.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: The Trilom gas has made the miners extremely dangerous and unpredictable. Eventually the affected miners will suffer from an agonizing death. Since there is no cure for Trilom poisoning the best thing that can be done for the miners is to put them out of their misery.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Report back to Chief Armstrong about the deaths of the miners.
